title: Definitions
context: PART II. COUNTY BOARDS OF WATER SUPPLY Cross References Loans and grants program, see chapter 340E. §54-11 Definitions. As used in this chapter: &ldquo;Board&rdquo; means the board of water supply of each county; &ldquo;Council&rdquo; means the council of each county; &ldquo;County&rdquo; means a county or city and county of the State; &ldquo;County attorney&rdquo; means the legal advisor of a county; &ldquo;County auditor&rdquo; means the auditor or finance officer of a county performing the audit function; &ldquo;County treasurer&rdquo; means the county official maintaining its treasury; &ldquo;Mayor&rdquo; means the executive officer of a county. [L 1961, c 155, pt of §1; Supp, §145A-1; HRS §54-11; am L 1987, c 283, §7]
